sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xin ji 心悸① , heart palpitation. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 Fj: 棗仁湯，治大 虛勞，夢泄精，莖核微弱，血氣枯竭，或醉飽傷於房室，驚惕忪悸，小 腹裏急方 , “The decoction with zao ren is a recipe to cure massive depletion exhaustion, wet dreams, weakness of the stalk and kernels (i.e. penis and testicles], as well as harm caused by entering the bedroom [for intercourse] intoxicated with wine and heaving eaten to repletion, fearfulness and agitated palpitation , and tensions in the lower abdomen”.
